name: cemil
title: cemil
description: Lists and opens frequently used links defined by a config file
author: akadir

preferences.name: configPath
preferences.title: Path to Config JSON File
preferences.description: Specify the path to your config json file

preferences.name: sortAlphabetically
preferences.title: If entries in each group should be alphabetically sorted or listed as defined in json
preferences.description: Specify if the entries sorted by alphabetically or not
preferences.label: Sort Alphabetically

commands.name: index
commands.title: cemil
commands.subtitle: suat
commands.description: list urls defined in json to quickly access and open in browser

scripts.prepublishOnly:
echo "

It seems like you are trying to publish the Raycast extension to npm.

If you did intend to publish it to npm, remove the \`prepublishOnly\` script and rerun \`npm publish\` again.
If you wanted to publish it to the Raycast Store instead, use \`npm run publish\` instead.

" && exit 1
